member.name: IWICBitmapCodecProgressNotification.RegisterProgressNotification
member.summary: Registers a progress notification callback function.
member.param: A function pointer to the application defined progress notification callback function. See ProgressNotificationCallback for the callback signature.
A pointer to component data for the callback method.
The and flags to use for progress notification.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapCodecProgressNotification
member.summary: Exposes methods used for progress notification for encoders and decoders.
